fields.title: Trading App Logo Pack
fields.description: Download our official logos in PNG and SVG formats. Use them for media, press, and promotional purposes. Please do not alter the logo colors.

fields.title: Brand Guidelines
fields.description: A detailed PDF that explains how to use the Trading App brand assets, including logo usage, colors, and typography.

fields.title: Press Release - September 2025
fields.description: Our official press release announcing the new Trading App features, including real-time analytics and margin trading.
